meanings.definition: The quality of being important or having meaning.
meanings.sent1: The significance of kindness cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent2: The significance of the discovery was evident to all.
meanings.sent3: The significance of a cat wearing a hat is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held a significance that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The significance of the ancient artifact was palpable.

meanings.definition: The meaning to be found in words or events.
meanings.sent1: The significance of the poem resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent2: She pondered the significance of his words long after he left.
meanings.sent3: The significance of a talking dog is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The significance of the storm was a warning of change.
meanings.sent5: The significance of the painting left viewers in awe.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something matters.
meanings.sent1: The significance of the decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent2: He failed to grasp the significance of his actions.
meanings.sent3: The significance of a penguin in a top hat is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The significance of the mountain loomed large in their journey.
meanings.sent5: The significance of the star's twinkle caught her attention.
